subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Billy Wagner said that he would recover from an elbow injury and return to baseball, but also said that the Mets would be “stupid” if they did not pursue an elite closer in the off-season.
snippet: Billy Wagner said that he would recover from an elbow injury and return to baseball, but also said that the Mets would be “stupid” if they did not pursue an elite closer in the off-season.
